title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid credentials including multi-factor authentication if enabled.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email and password.
Complete multi-factor authentication steps if prompted.
Click the login button.
User is successfully authenticated and redirected to the main dashboard.

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid email or password.
Click the login button.
User is not authenticated and an appropriate error message is displayed.

title: Role-Based Permissions Enforcement
description: Verify that users only have access to features and routes allowed by their role permissions.

steps.description: Login as a user with limited role permissions.
Attempt to access restricted routes or perform unauthorized actions.
Access is denied and user is shown a permission error or redirected appropriately.
Login as an admin user.
Access all available routes and perform admin actions.
Access is granted to all authorized admin features.

title: Member Management CRUD Operations
description: Verify full create, read, update, and delete functionality for member records including validation and searching/filtering.

steps.description: Navigate to the Members management page.
Add a new member with valid details.
New member is created and visible in the list.
Search for the new member using the search functionality.
Member shows up correctly in filtered results.
Update member details with valid changes.
Member information is updated successfully.
Delete the member.
Member is removed from the list with no residual data.

title: Donation Recording and Receipt Generation
description: Verify donation entry with multiple payment methods, correct donation type classification, and generation of correct receipts.

steps.description: Navigate to the Donations management page.
Enter a new donation specifying donor, amount, type, and payment method.
Donation is correctly saved and reflected in the donation list.
Generate a donation receipt.
Receipt is generated with accurate donation details in expected format.

title: Beneficiary Aid Application Workflow
description: Verify complete workflow for beneficiary aid applications from creation through status updates, notes addition, and document uploads.

steps.description: Navigate to the Beneficiaries management page.
Create a new beneficiary aid application with all required details.
Application is saved and visible in application list.
Update the status of the aid application.
Add notes to the application.
Upload necessary supporting documents.
Status changes, notes, and documents are saved and displayed properly.

title: Financial Transaction Entry and Reporting
description: Verify income and expense tracking, proper categorization, and generation of financial reports with correct summaries.

steps.description: Navigate to the Finance Income and Expense pages.
Record income and expense transactions with all required fields.
Transactions are saved and appear in the list correctly.
Generate financial category reports and audit trail details.
Reports reflect accurate transaction data and category totals.

title: Dashboard Real-Time Analytics and Data Accuracy
description: Verify dashboard displays real-time analytics, including charts and recent activity, with correct and up-to-date information.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dashboard page.
Dashboard metrics and charts load without delay and display accurate real-time data.
Verify recent activities list is updated when new events occur.
Recent activity section reflects latest system actions correctly.

title: Security Protections Against CSRF and XSS Attacks
description: Verify that the system effectively blocks cross-site request forgery and cross-site scripting attacks through protections and sanitization.

steps.description: Attempt to perform forms submissions with malicious CSRF tokens or without tokens.
Requests blocked or rejected with appropriate error preventing CSRF attack.
Inject XSS payloads into input fields.
Input sanitization removes malicious scripts, no scripts execute in client or server.

title: Rate Limiting Enforcement on API Endpoints
description: Verify rate limiting effectively restricts excessive requests to critical API endpoints.

steps.description: Send rapid successive API requests exceeding the allowed threshold.
Requests above limit receive rate limit error response and further requests blocked temporarily.

title: Offline Mode and Background Sync Functionality
description: Verify that the application seamlessly supports offline usage and syncs data correctly when network is restored.

steps.description: Switch device to offline mode.
Perform data entry actions such as creating members or donations.
Data entry is allowed with feedback indicating offline mode; data is cached locally.
Restore network connection.
Background sync processes offline data to server without data loss.

title: Mobile Responsiveness and Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify that UI components and pages render correctly and maintain full functionality on various mobile devices and meet WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards.

steps.description: Access application on multiple device widths including common mobile screen sizes.
Navigation, forms, tables, and all UI components adapt responsively without layout breakage.
Test keyboard navigation, screen reader labels, and color contrast for accessibility compliance.
UI meets WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines supporting keyboard only operation and screen reader usage.

title: File Upload and OCR Document Processing
description: Verify that file uploads for beneficiary documents and other forms work correctly and OCR processing extracts accurate text data.

steps.description: Navigate to a form requiring document upload.
Upload various file types within accepted format and size limits.
Files upload successfully and stored correctly.
Trigger OCR processing on uploaded document.
OCR extracts text accurately and populates corresponding fields.

title: Internal Messaging System Bulk and Real-Time Message Delivery
description: Verify internal messaging supports sending and receiving messages in real time and can handle bulk messaging without failure.

steps.description: Navigate to Internal Messaging page.
Send a single message to one user.
Recipient receives the message instantaneously in real time.
Send bulk messages to multiple users.
All intended recipients receive the message successfully without delay or errors.

title: Advanced Search and Filtering Accuracy
description: Verify global and module-specific search and filtering operates correctly, returning relevant and accurate results promptly.

steps.description: Perform global search with keyword existing in multiple entities.
Search results include correct matches across all modules.
Apply multiple filters in member or donation list.
Filtered results match all criteria correctly.

title: Notifications Real-Time Delivery and Categorization
description: Verify that user notifications are delivered in real time and categorized correctly into types such as alerts, messages, and updates.

steps.description: Trigger various system events generating notifications.
User receives notifications promptly with correct categorization in notification center.
User marks notifications as read or deletes them.
Notifications update status accordingly and no longer appear as unread.

title: Form Validation and Error Messages
description: Verify that all forms perform client and server side validation, disallow invalid inputs, and provide clear error messages.

steps.description: Fill form fields with invalid data (empty, wrong format, out of range).
Form validation blocks submission and shows relevant error messages.
Submit form with valid data.
Form submission succeeds without errors.

title: Data Export in Excel and PDF Formats
description: Verify that key reports and data exports generate accurate Excel and PDF files matching displayed data.

steps.description: Generate donation report and export it as Excel.
Exported Excel file contains complete and correct donation data.
Generate financial report and export as PDF.
PDF file is formatted correctly with accurate summary and details.

title: Deployment and Environment Configuration Verification
description: Verify deployment scripts work correctly and environment-specific configurations apply properly without manual errors.

steps.description: Deploy application to staging environment using documented deployment scripts.
Deployment completes without errors and application config matches environment settings.
Deploy application to production environment.
Production application runs smoothly with all environment-specific configurations applied.

title: Error Boundary Handling
description: Verify application displays user-friendly error pages when runtime errors or network errors occur, and recovers gracefully.

steps.description: Simulate a runtime error in a component.
Error boundary catches error and displays fallback error UI.
Disconnect network while performing data fetch.
Network error boundary shows appropriate message and recovery options.
